languages.text: Дерзкая вылазка Ардженты во время штурма Ефрата-II принесла плоды — захваченный еретик при допросе упомянул название "Салис Прайм". Полученные от него сведения помогут найти маршрут к планете. Арджента сообщит, когда это случится.

traits.locale_text: Дерзкая вылазка Ардженты во время штурма Ефрата-II принесла плоды — захваченный еретик при допросе упомянул название "Салис Прайм". Полученные от него сведения помогут найти маршрут к планете. Арджента сообщит, когда это случится.

languages.text: Argenta's daring foray during the assault on Eufrates II was fruitful — a captured heretic mentioned the name Salis Prime during interrogation. The information extracted from the cultist is sure to help Argenta find the way back to the planet. Argenta will inform the Lord Captain when that happens.
languages.original_text: Дерзкая вылазка Ардженты во время штурма Ефрата-II принесла плоды — захваченный еретик при допросе упомянул название "Салис Прайм". Полученные от него сведения помогут найти маршрут к планете. Арджента сообщит, когда это случится.

traits.locale_text: Argenta's daring foray during the assault on Eufrates II brought was fruitful — a captured heretic mentioned the name Salis Prime during interrogation. The information extracted from the cultist is sure to help Argenta find the way back to the planet. Argenta will inform the Lord Captain when that happens.

Argenta's daring foray during the assault on Eufrates II brought was fruitful — a captured heretic mentioned the name Salis Prime during interrogation. The information extracted from the cultist is sure to help Argenta find the way back to the planet. Argenta will inform the Lord Captain when that happens.

The information extracted from the cultist is sure to help Argenta find the way back to the planet. Argenta will inform the Lord Captain when that happens.

Argenta's daring foray during the assault on Eufrates II was fruitful — a captured heretic mentioned the name Salis Prime during interrogation. The information extracted from the cultist is sure to help Argenta find the way back to the planet. Argenta will inform the Lord Captain when that happens.

languages.text: L'audacieuse incursion d'Argenta pendant l'attaque d'Euphrate-II a porté ses fruits : un hérétique capturé a mentionné le nom « Salis Primus » pendant son interrogatoire. Cette information devrait l'aider à retrouver le chemin de la planète. Quand elle y parviendra, elle en informera {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}.
languages.original_text: Argenta's daring foray during the assault on Eufrates II was fruitful — a captured heretic mentioned the name Salis Prime during interrogation. The information extracted from the cultist is sure to help Argenta find the way back to the planet. Argenta will inform the Lord Captain when that happens.

traits.locale_text: L'audacieuse incursion d'Argenta pendant l'attaque d'Euphrate-II a porté ses fruits : un hérétique capturé a mentionné le nom « Salis Primus » pendant son interrogatoire. Cette information devrait l'aider à retrouver le chemin de la planète. Quand elle y parviendra, elle en informera {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}.

languages.text: 攻打欧夫拉茨二号星时，阿洁塔的果断进攻取得了丰硕的成果。一名被俘虏的异端分子在审讯期间，提到了萨利斯主星这个名字。那名邪教徒供出了关于那颗行星的相关情报，可以帮助阿洁塔再次找到道路。等阿洁塔打算前往萨利斯主星时，她肯定会通知行商浪人。
languages.original_text: Argenta's daring foray during the assault on Eufrates II was fruitful — a captured heretic mentioned the name Salis Prime during interrogation. The information extracted from the cultist is sure to help Argenta find the way back to the planet. Argenta will inform the Lord Captain when that happens.

traits.locale_text: 攻打欧夫拉茨二号星时，阿洁塔的果断进攻取得了丰硕的成果。一名被俘虏的异端分子在审讯期间，提到了萨利斯主星这个名字。那名邪教徒供出了关于那颗行星的相关情报，可以帮助阿洁塔再次找到道路。等阿洁塔打算前往萨利斯主星时，她肯定会通知行商浪人。

languages.text: ユーフラテス・IIでの襲撃中に見せたアルジェンタの果敢な侵攻が実を結んだ。捕らえられた異端者が、尋問中にサリス・プライムという名前を吐いたのだ。教団から引き出した情報は、アルジェンタが惑星に戻る方法を見つけるのに役立つと思われる。アルジェンタはそうなった場合、ロード・キャプテンに報告するだろう。
languages.original_text: Argenta's daring foray during the assault on Eufrates II was fruitful — a captured heretic mentioned the name Salis Prime during interrogation. The information extracted from the cultist is sure to help Argenta find the way back to the planet. Argenta will inform the Lord Captain when that happens.

traits.locale_text: ユーフラテス・IIでの襲撃中に見せたアルジェンタの果敢な侵攻が実を結んだ。捕らえられた異端者が、尋問中にサリス・プライムという名前を吐いたのだ。教団から引き出した情報は、アルジェンタが惑星に戻る方法を見つけるのに役立つと思われる。アルジェンタはそうなった場合、ロード・キャプテンに報告するだろう。

languages.text: Argentas kühner Vorstoß während des Angriffs auf Eufrates II war fruchtbar — ein gefangen genommener Ketzer hat im Verhör den Namen Salis Prime erwähnt. Die Informationen, die aus dem Kultisten extrahiert wurden, werden Argenta sicher helfen, den Weg zurück zu dem Planeten zu finden. Argenta wird den Lord Captain in Kenntnis setzen, sobald das geschieht.
languages.original_text: Argenta's daring foray during the assault on Eufrates II was fruitful — a captured heretic mentioned the name Salis Prime during interrogation. The information extracted from the cultist is sure to help Argenta find the way back to the planet. Argenta will inform the Lord Captain when that happens.

traits.locale_text: Argentas kühner Vorstoß während des Angriffs auf Eufrates II war fruchtbar — ein gefangen genommener Ketzer hat im Verhör den Namen Salis Prime erwähnt. Die Informationen, die aus dem Kultisten extrahiert wurden, werden Argenta sicher finden, den Weg zurück zu dem Planeten zu finden. Argenta wird den Lord Captain in Kenntnis setzen, sobald das geschieht.

languages.text: La audaz intervención de Argenta durante el asalto a Eufrates II ha dado sus frutos: un hereje capturado mencionó el nombre de Salis Prime durante el interrogatorio. La información obtenida del cultista ayudará a Argenta a encontrar el camino de vuelta al planeta. Argenta informará a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán cuando ocurra.
languages.original_text: Argenta's daring foray during the assault on Eufrates II was fruitful — a captured heretic mentioned the name Salis Prime during interrogation. The information extracted from the cultist is sure to help Argenta find the way back to the planet. Argenta will inform the Lord Captain when that happens.

traits.locale_text: La audaz intervención de Argenta durante el asalto a Eufrates II ha dado sus frutos: un hereje capturado mencionó el nombre de Salis Prime durante el interrogatorio. La información obtenida del cultista ayudará a Argenta a encontrar el camino de vuelta al planeta. Argenta informará a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán cuando ocurra.

languages.text: Argenta'nın Eufrates II saldırısı sırasındaki cüretkâr akını boşa çıkmadı. Ele geçirilen kâfirlerden biri, sorgulama sırasında Salis Prime isminden bahsetti. Tarikatçıdan edinilen bilgiler, Argenta'nın gezegene geri dönüş yolunu bulmasına yardım edecek. Argenta, yolu bulduğunda Lord Kaptan'a haber verecek.
languages.original_text: Argenta's daring foray during the assault on Eufrates II was fruitful — a captured heretic mentioned the name Salis Prime during interrogation. The information extracted from the cultist is sure to help Argenta find the way back to the planet. Argenta will inform the Lord Captain when that happens.
